name: wordsearch_generator
description: Wordsearch generator, extensible for different languages.

scripts.web-link: cd public && ln -sf ../alphabet_charsets . && ln -sf ../alphabet_prob_dists . && mkdir -p ./example_cfg_files && cd example_cfg_files && ln -sf ../../docs/examples/* . && cd .. && ln -sf ../alphabets.json . && ln -sf ../node_modules/temp_js_logger/temp_js_logger.js . && ln -sf ../wordsearch_generator.js . && mkdir -p docs && cd docs && ln -sf ../../docs/img . && cd .. && ln -sf ../node_modules/ogallagher-i18n/dist/i18n.js .
scripts.qg-anki: cd quizcard-generator && npm run build && cd .. && echo "copy anki card templates to frontend" && mkdir -p public/out/webserver/anki/cards && cp -r quizcard-generator/anki/cards/fill-blanks public/out/webserver/anki/cards && mkdir -p public/out/webserver/quizcard-generator && echo "copy quizgen docs resources to frontend" && mkdir -p public/quizcard-generator/docs/img && cp -r quizcard-generator/docs/img public/quizcard-generator/docs/.
